titleStmt.title: A remedy for sedition vvherin are conteyned many thynges, concernyng the true and loyall obeysance, that comme[n]s owe vnto their prince and soueraygne lorde the Kynge.
titleStmt.author: Morison, Richard, Sir, d. 1556.
Cheke, John, Sir, 1514-1557.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Morison by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints; wrongly attributed to Sir John Cheke--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Place of publication and publisher from colophon.
Reproduction of originals in the Cambridge University Library and the Huntington Library.
